AI is used to show intelligence in activities such as speech recognition, computer vision, and language translation

Examples of AI applications include web search engines (Google Search), recommendation systems (YouTube, Amazon, Netflix), understanding human speech (Siri, Alexa), self-driving cars (Waymo), generative or creative tools (ChatGPT, AI art), automated decision-making and strategic game systems (chess, Go)
AI is used in a wide range of topics and activities
